website_summaries.verdict: A top-notch linen cabinet that offers a wonderful blend of convenience and affordability.
pros: Natural fiberboard construction ensures the cabinet can serve you well both now and in the future
Boasts 2 interior shelves with adjustable heights, guaranteeing you can use the cabinet to store a broad array of items
Easy to assemble in just minutes

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing - love the look
customer_reviews.text: This piece is amazing. Small enough to not take up much room and big enough to store a good amount of items as you can see in my pic. Looks great in the bathroom. Easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Corcoran

customer_reviews.title: This is wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This little cabinet is just darling! I was so pleased that it was packed well and none of the parts were damaged or scratched. It is heavy and solid feeling. Mine didn’t come with any instructions, but it was easy to figure out. If yours doesn’t then I advise putting the top on very last, after the rest of it is assembled and the doors are in place. The assembly hardware was the best I’ve seen in a product like this and it went together square and strong. The doors close on magnetic latches and it is a pleasure to open and close. I am so pleased with this and highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Felicity

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than depicted
customer_reviews.text: The dimensions were not accurate. I wanted this to store our crockpot. This barely even fits anything, for the price I could have bought something larger in the store
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. I have put together quite a bit of ...
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this cabinet yesterday and it arrived this afternoon! Amazing. I have put together quite a bit of IKEA furniture and this was even easier because all of the small pieces were bagged and labeled. Fantastic. It feels stable and is more generous in size than I expected! I only hit one glitch with the assembly and it was due to user error. This piece more than met my expectations and took about 30 minutes to assemble. I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cabinet for anywhere!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I purchased this cabinet! It took me about 30 minutes to assemble but was wonderful once completed. It holds just what I need and adds the perfect touch the my bedside area. I first purchased for my bathroom, but the decided by my bed would be best and it looks great! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MJ Hames

customer_reviews.title: Decent Quality Bathroom Floor Storage Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Really nice, good quality and easy to put together. At first I felt a bit challenged when taking inventory of all the small pieces but they were bagged and labeled. The accompanying instructions were easy to follow. Being this sort of thing is not my strong suit assembly took me a few hours. It feels pretty stable, quite generous in size and attractive. Seems to be a perfect little replacement for my previous cabinet that was water damaged beyond repair. Needed some extra storage space. Con: Product arrived with a tiny chip. Also, in spite of using light pressure when I screwed on the balance support straps the wood sustained a crack.
customer_reviews.author: Linny

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap materials. The shelf was chipped and broken and the door keeps falling off.
customer_reviews.author: JBoyle

customer_reviews.title: EASY to put together & looks nice too!
customer_reviews.text: I can't (cannot cannot cannot) believe how easy this was to put together! I did it by myself and had it done in under a half-hour..even the handyman was impressed! None of the pieces were labeled so I took a moment to see how it should all fit together. Grooves to the back to slide the 'thicker than cardboard" backing in, etc. I had originally purchased one off another site at twice the price with hundreds more pieces that I returned because it was too complicated. I'm so happy I did! This was a piece of cake and it looks nice too! May order a second!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst buy! Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: When we receive it, it actually smelled really bad. Feel like chemical and toxic. We do not expect it would be a high quality product due to the price. However, we have not used it for a month, one of the door suddenly fell into pieces. I really I did not buy this. It not even last for a month. Completely waste money and waste my time to assemble it. One star just for the white color. I never gave negative reviews during my life time. This is the first one, so you can tell how disappointed I am.
customer_reviews.author: Fan

customer_reviews.title: Low quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: This product was fairly simple to put together, but one of the doors is warped so it’s crooked. The door sticks out at the bottom and bit and won’t close with the top shelf in place
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Moceri

customer_reviews.title: Great little cupboard.
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy it was to assemble and it looks really great. Good value. You can paint any color you like. I have a huge potty room in my master bath and put this in to allow more storage and less wasted space. I don't know why builders think people want a potty room that is so long. Mine would fit a unit twice as deep easily and still allow plenty of room for males or females to use the potty. I hate wasted space and this solved the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Li

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: Many of the pieces came scratched due to the softness of the materials, also the whole thing is unstable it looks like the holes were drilled wrong on one of the sides so the whole thing just wobbles. I am extremely disappointed with the quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeni

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but smell has it in the garage!
customer_reviews.text: Bottom line: This cabinet has a horrible, long lasting odor that's unbearable and has triggered breathing problems in a family member. It was assembled a week ago and had to put it out in the garage where the the hopes are it will air out. This was purchased the end of November but wasn't given a a gift until recently. If we had a clue of this noxious odor, never would have ordered it!
customer_reviews.author: C. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great for a small space
customer_reviews.text: I put this together in about 1.5 hours because my toddler boy desperately wanted to help. Directions were clear enough and there weren't a ton of pieces, so assembly was quick. It's definitely a narrow cabinet in terms of depth (~12in), but that's what I needed for my 1/2 bath. It's typical build-it-yourself furniture in terms of sturdiness. If you want a really solid piece of wood furniture, this isn't it, but it'll do for a guest bathroom cabinet. Adjustable shelves are nice. The design is cute.
customer_reviews.author: MissB

customer_reviews.title: Am I happy with it? Yeah. Would I buy it again? No.
customer_reviews.text: So I am pretty happy with this product. It looks nice and was easy to put together. However, I’ve bought a lot of furnature off of amazon and this all feels around that same amazon quality, but for the size of this thing and the quality I would not pay $70+ dollars for this again. It did come with some small marks/dings but they’re not noticeable so I’m fine w them. It is also missing a piece, but fortunately it is a really small piece that doesn’t play a huge factor in the construction of the item, so again, I am okay with this. Overall, looks nice and does the job but not worth the price in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy + attractive - wish the shelves were configured differently
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived quickly, was easy to assemble, and is attractive. It's definitely not the highest quality - I can tell the paint will chip over time, but we are satisfied for the price. One issue is that the shelves are not very high so it can really only store certain things. Also we did appreciate that it came with wall anchors - safety first!!
customer_reviews.author: Larissa

customer_reviews.title: Waste
customer_reviews.text: So I was excited to put this together after my bathroom renovation. Missing piece E! How could you miss something like that in packaging? Seems to be easy to chip so be careful with this cabinet. I'd pick a different one if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to hold toilet paper because I was tired of the packages sitting on the floor. It was easy to assemble and I think it took my less then ten minutes after I got everything out of the box. It was packaged great no dings on any of the wood and plenty of styrofoam in between the parts. With the shelves installed I was able to get 6 rolls up, 2 rolls deep and 4 rolls across. That’s about 24 rolls which is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda DeVincentz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful unit, unbearable smell
customer_reviews.text: I have just assembled the unit. It is fairly easy to assemble, and takes roughly 1 hr. The unit is beautiful as advertised. The only, though serious, flaw is the smell. It has this toxic smell, borderline unbearable. I don’t own a balcony or a garage, thereby cannot just put it out there to air out. I am seriously thinking about what should I do with it, now that I have taken the time to assemble it. Update: It has been a month, and the unit still smells. I have decided to donate the unit to the goodwill. My advice to potential buyers: don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Curiosity

customer_reviews.title: Sort of waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: If you think about your health issues, I recommend don't buy this one. It's good for the shape and storage capacity, but really chemical smells coming out for a long time. I cleaned out with alcohol after wet tissue, but it seems never solved out. The terrible thing is the inside chemical smell that ruined my things since i stored disposable cups and some hand towels. Everything was infected from the chemical smell. I am gonna dump away this one.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany chung

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: I have not assembled it yet. But, I felt a need to commend the packaging, labeling, and shipping of this product! I ordered furniture pieces before, much bigger and heavier. This is the best I have ever experienced! Every piece, EVERY PIECE, is labeled! All the hardware is individually wrapped with like pieces and labeled. No guessing, counting or sorting required. And, the entire product was packed in styrofoam...lots of it. Backed by corner reinforcements, each end had MDF protection BOARDS to cover the item, even though the box flaps essentially already created a triple layer. I am amazed.
customer_reviews.author: alohamazon

customer_reviews.title: Rickety crap from china
customer_reviews.text: I would give zero in sturdy! It is lovely but rickety as all hell! I have put together more furniture for myself, grown kids and friends! I could do it for a living! I did product manufacturing to put myself through college! This is poor design. The back has no support so It rocks sideways due to the 2 panels with a slip rod. It needs a structured support so I am going to do this across the back at mid point.
customer_reviews.author: Trish H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, looks great
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute little cabinet, perfect for the spot in my kitchen. It went together easily. The only thing I don't particularly like about it is the chemical smell, which is still there even after many days. Other than that, it's great. I'm using it to store empty jars so the smell isn't really an issue. It might be an issue for anyone storing food like flour etc. in it. The possibility exists that flour or other types of dry goods might absorb the odor. If not for that problem, I would have given this 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: word addicted

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product! I was a little nervous, because it is hard to know what you will really get with so many fake reviews on Amazon nowadays, but I am very pleased with the purchase. It came well packaged, with all of the parts well labeled, and easy to follow picture directions. It took about 20 minutes to put together. It is sturdy, heavy and looks more expensive than it is. I also liked that it came with wall attachment safety straps. I ordered 2 more today! :)
customer_reviews.author: Denise F

customer_reviews.title: Great little cabinet.
customer_reviews.text: We have a little half bath that didn't have anywhere to put extra supplies, this is perfect for the spot. It's small enough that it fits well, but there's plenty of room for toilet paper and a few bathroom items. It looks good too, it's quite sturdy and has a nice finish. I think it took me about 20 minutes to assemble, the directions were not particularly detailed, but it's not rocket science. I'm very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: James D.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Ive been buying some furniture for storage so this is the third item I have built, it was differnt because it had pantry doors instead of drawers but very easy to figure out. I finished building it in maybe 1hr-2hr but I was busy on and off so shouldn't take as long, all the pieces were included, im using it for food storage in our small home 👍 compact and perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: mis-drilled holes
customer_reviews.text: Product is satisfactory in appearance for the price, but all four holes that secure the top to the unit via camlock were mis-drilled approximately 1/4 inch low, making it so that I will have to fill the holes with dowel, and try to re-drill them higher. Even for a cheap piece of furniture, this is unacceptible.
customer_reviews.author: carl nation

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality, functional.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. This cabinet does the trick, it's easy to assemble, and is of decent quality. The package was missing the small screws needed to secure the magnetic plates, so I had to use small wood screws I had on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlee

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Wish I had spent more for better quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because the amount of decent reviews. Maybe I just got the outlier... Looks decent, but quite unsturdy. The pegs that hold up the shelves are very loose and insecure, and you can wobble the shelves easily. It could certainly use another piece to keep it the whole unit from wobbling. Overall, meh...I would rather spend 2x the price of this for something that I wouldnt be worried about opening often., unfortunately I bought this for stuff I frequently use.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Dimensions inaccurate?
customer_reviews.text: Looking to use this as a shoe cabinet. Per the one photo and review, shelves are only 9.5 inches long vs 11.8” stated on the item description. This is annoying because it will require a trip to the UPS store just to return. Not risking having to put it together to learn it will not fit a pair of size 9 shoes. Gotta get the right info on your site!
customer_reviews.author: C-town

customer_reviews.title: Not a lot of storage
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, nice looking. Not a lot of storage space at all I can fit about 2 towels on each shelf rolled up and that is it. Really have to make sure they are stuffed in there right otherwise the magnets aren’t that strong and the doors will pop open. Depending what you are using it for it is a nice little piece. I was surprised though at how small it actually was.
customer_reviews.author: meghan

customer_reviews.title: Smells bad
customer_reviews.text: The paint used for this is very strong. It smells bad and whatever I store in it, penetrates it with its scent. I tried Lysol wiping it and it still smells bad. It’s been 2 weeks and it still smells. It took a while to build, it’ll be as durable as how well you screw in all the pieces. I just can’t stand the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Dinamirtha

customer_reviews.title: The perfect bathroom cabinet! Score!
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet was exactly what we needed to pull our bathroom together. I purchased the dark brown color. It has a little bit more height and less width than most bathroom cabinets which is exactly what we needed. It looks stunning and very high-quality. We had no problem assembling it, and it came with instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Hersey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, great extra storage
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with this cabinet. It assembled very easily, is sturdy, holds quite a bit of stuff, and adds a nice decorative look to my bathroom. It’s not as bright of a white as I would have liked, bit it is still white and not off-white or cream. I put on my own knobs to match with the rest of my bathroom cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: MollDoll

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the bathroom and their customer service is A+
customer_reviews.text: We needed a smallish cabinet with doors for our bathroom and this cabinet worked perfectly. Not only that, but their customer service is wonderful. Our door on the cabinet broke and they sent a replacement right away, no questions asked. I really appreciate that kind of service and would highly recommend this product. And thanks to Ganesh for helping us out with the door!
customer_reviews.author: no's

customer_reviews.title: Fits to a Tea
customer_reviews.text: I looked for months for cabinets upon which I could display my tea sets and that would fit in this tight area. I was a little dubious (in fact I returned them unopened once) because I had never assembled any furniture. The first one probably took me an hour and a half because I didn't follow the directions. The second one took less than 30 minutes. They're pretty sturdy and suit my purposes exactly. The one improvement I would suggest is making the shelf supports fit tighter because they fall out very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Nice cabinet....but misleading photo about shoes
customer_reviews.text: Really nice cabinet, but the picture showing it holding shoes facing forward is misleading -- as I learned the hard way by purchasing and assembling the cabinet -- so I'm giving it only three stars. I have men's size 8 shoes and it doesn't come close to fitting in that direction. Amazon or Visagle, may I suggest you remove that photo? Sell the cabinet on its merits, not on a misleading feature.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Hey! Yes!
customer_reviews.text: This is simply beautiful. The reviews don't lie. You may need a very patient and thinking person to assemble, but..... then... I mean, look at it. We needed a bright, clean, classy and simplistic piece of storage furniture that raised the look of its environment (bathroom), and, boom. It happened. I feel like writing and thanking the designers and manufacturers, and distributors, as well, for not one damaged piece.
customer_reviews.author: danny w.

customer_reviews.title: Wish I liked it more.
customer_reviews.text: It came with two dark marks on it. One on the top and the other on the bottom. The bottom is larger, but I don’t care about it since no one will see it. The top is smaller, but more visible. Also it seems that one side is slight higher than the other..
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: SMELLS
customer_reviews.text: Easy to build,nice design and size. I loved that it had two magnetic closures too. Perfect for in bath. My lesser stars are due to the SMELL that gave me a headache! Its been weeks and its finally going away. I smell it when the cupboard gets opened though. Gives me a headache- I'm sure its the processing chemicals used in the press board.
customer_reviews.author: JANA

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to bathroom
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for small cabinet to put in our bathroom to use as a hamper. This worked perfectly. My husband put it together with our 6 year old so it was easy. We didn't used the inside shelves. We installed 3 hooks inside to hang the laundry bag. It is perfect for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: I want to like this.
customer_reviews.text: I had high expectations for this cabinet considering the price. The paint smell is a bit over whelming. The cabinet assembled pretty easily. I noticed some imperfections in the manufactured parts prior to assembly but still gave it a chance and put it together. Bummer, it’s warped and misaligned and causing the left door to rub against the frame each time it’s opened. Wish this had adjustable door hinges that could easily remedy it. Probably going to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: MARK A GIESIGE

customer_reviews.title: Bathroom cabinet storage
customer_reviews.text: Storage cabinet was easy to assembly, well made for price and looks good. Ensure you review size as msy be smaller than expected. Reason for 3 stars versus 5 stars is the strong smell of the finish which is hard to remove or reduce. Took quite a while after doing numereous items before smell reduced so icould put towels in it
customer_reviews.author: ross swanson

customer_reviews.title: Very bad product
customer_reviews.text: Very bad product . It’s smells too much of varnish . I am very dissatisfied. :(
customer_reviews.author: Priyanka

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble; great storage
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, only took about 30 minutes. I got them for the bathrooms at my office and they are perfect, just enough room for extra tp and paper towels. Very sturdy and practical.
customer_reviews.author: Elyse Pancotti

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Not going to say it’s a bad product because it’s not It’s fairly easy to assemble didn’t like the finish seems to be cheap but we’ll see Ordered two put one together and sent the other one back just didn’t seem to empress
customer_reviews.author: Jasper Potter

customer_reviews.title: Great for dvds
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to house our dvds. It’s nice and good quality. It didn’t take long to assemble I only wish it was a tad larger. It arrived fast, and it wasn’t to heavy either. Great quality for the money
customer_reviews.author: matthew morton

customer_reviews.title: Nice Design but Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: This fit perfectly in the place where I intended it to go. The doors does seem to be not lining up perfectly. There's a huge gap between the center opening. The whole thing seems to be made up of MDF and not real wood because the footing got chipped really easy when my son bumped into to it with his knee scooter.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry L

customer_reviews.title: WHAT IS THAT SMELL???
customer_reviews.text: OMG I was not expecting that toxic smell that came out when I unboxed this. I had to leave it outside for 24 hours to get some of the smell out and I took a wet cloth with water and vinegar to really clean it. It's way better now but for that reason alone I wouldn't recommend this. Even though the storage space is great and it has a clean look to it the smell alone kills it for me. If you want to cough up a lung then get it.
customer_reviews.author: Yorelis

customer_reviews.title: Met our expectations!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this product for an alcove type section of our kitchen. Not only does it look pretty but we can store a lot of "pantry" products. The small scale was perfect for the space. Nice paint finish. My wife is very happy with product. Might order one for our bathroom. Dimensions are pretty accurate. Very happy with purchase. Bruce E.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce E

customer_reviews.title: Makes a huge difference in my small bathroom!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I moved into a place with a small bathroom with no place to put my hair tools and products, no place to put makeup. You can put towels or sheets or toilet paper or whatever you want inside. It is eleven inches deep but it does fit a lot. It looks very cute in my bathroom. I did have help putting it together but it was fairly easy.
customer_reviews.author: Donna D

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok.
customer_reviews.text: Assemble in the room you are going to use it. This is not meant to be moved once assembled. It looks nice but I tried to move it to the upstairs bathroom and it all fell apart.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Love this small cabinet in my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: As others have commented, this product is very well packed to protect the finish. At first I saw the package of hardware and was a little daunted. Once I got out the directions it was pretty easy. If you take your time, 1 person can put this together. I had some distractions so I think I could have put it together in about 1/2 hour. Just what we needed in our apartment kitchen for items that we need daily but don't have any more drawer space.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Finley

customer_reviews.title: Exactly As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: As far as measurements and what it looks like, it is exactly as advertised. I needed it for a small space and it fit the small space. The instructions provided could have been more specific, but we figured it all out pretty quickly anyway.
customer_reviews.author: MaineInnkeeper

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy shelf
customer_reviews.text: This shelf was a perfect size to add storage to our downstairs powder room. It was packed well and fairly easy to assemble. Once assembled it was very sturdy. We are very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Good storage space. Bigger than anticipated.
customer_reviews.text: In really like this piece, but it was a little bigger than I expected. That just means I have more storage space! Easy to assemble, all parts included and you will have a few extra pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Relatively easy to assemble by myself I accidentally broke two wooden screws, but an extra was supplied, and I used wood glue on the other. Just go slow and follow the picture instructions. Def need small screwdriver for the assembly.
customer_reviews.author: M. Neal

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking cabinet. Not too bad to put together, took my husband 45 minutes or so. Happy enough that I bought a second to go with my first.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A. Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I am a hobbyist woodworker I find the cabinets that I ordered are extremely high-quality easy to acceptable No missing parts good instructions they even gave us one extra part a piece. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson c

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed for a small bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I don't have much storage space in the bathroom so this came in super handy. Love that it has 3 shelves. It's easy to assemble and the weight is light enough to move around. Really glad I came across this little unit.
customer_reviews.author: JBE

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: This likely won't be the sturdiest piece of furniture you have in your home, but it's very simple to put together and looks cute when done. Overall I would say it's exactly what you expect for the price, nothing more & nothing less.
customer_reviews.author: Holley Ackerson

customer_reviews.title: Nice cabinet  serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: Using this in my tiny bathrooms to store items out of sight. Keeps the bathroom nice and neat with items easy accessible.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Cravens

customer_reviews.title: Xtra storage for small bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Size was perfect for what I needed, just wish it was a little deeper. The color was almost a match for my expresso vanity. Have learned from past experience to use wood glue when assembling. Even though there’s not written instructions, just do exactly what the pictures show, in order and it’s not that hard to put together. Thought was a little over priced but after searching for a while, I’m happy with this cabinet. Original packaging was excellent and Amazon also put in bigger box with extra packaging so arrived in perfect shape.
customer_reviews.author: Debi J

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: he drilling of the pre-drilled holes were poorly drilled out. Since I'm 74 and have extensive arthritis in my hands this "added carving out" of existing holes was lengthy and hard for me to do, I chose this cabinet based on your description of easy installation. I managed to assemble it but the correctly drilled depth of pre-drilled holes would have made the overall job such much easier.
customer_reviews.author: jane

customer_reviews.title: Not to hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Takes assembly but it is not too hard if you follow the instructions. Cabinet looks nice in my bathroom next to my vanity.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo Writes

customer_reviews.title: So easy
customer_reviews.text: This came within two days, perfectly packaged with extra parts. It was a breeze to assemble in under an hour. Excellent for extra space in a tiny bathroom. Clean lines. The finish on the top edge is a bit scratchy, probably won't wear well, but for now its perfect and the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: KJM

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice for a small storage cabinet.
customer_reviews.text: Went together easily and looks good for what it's intended for. I placed it in a short hallway as a place to set my purse and store things like winter gloves, and short rubber boots. I needed something with a slim profile and it is just that.
customer_reviews.author: T. T.

customer_reviews.title: Great small cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I cannot ask more: nice design, great storage and compact size. VASAGLE UBCB60W Bathroom Floor Storage Cabinet with Double Door Adjustable Shelf is perfect for my small bath. Good quality even if it is not in wood.
customer_reviews.author: simona

customer_reviews.title: Good value, easy to build.
customer_reviews.text: This chest went together so easily--great instructions and perfectly milled parts. Extra hardware was included. Took me about 10 minutes to build it without help. It looks nice and seems sturdy. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Its great!
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered this and received the cabinet without hardware. I left a bad review and SONGMICS was quick to respond to fix the issue and credited me for my inconvenience. I received the hardware and it put together beautifully. It's perfect for small spaces in bathrooms and looks amazing. I am only giving it 4 stars because one of the magnet pieces on the top of the cabinet is loose. I tried for so long to get the screws in but they just wouldn't go. So the doors are a little wobbly and off center but nothing extreme. More of annoyance. Definitely worth the money and SONGMICS has excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Grillo

customer_reviews.title: Reccomend!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this furniture. I needed something compact that could fit all our stuff into. And its perfect. No problen with it so far
customer_reviews.author: Daisy HP

customer_reviews.title: I like that they are in a covered unit
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this for my shoes in the garage. I like that they are in a covered unit. And, it looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Diane F.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and closes well
customer_reviews.text: High end actually and closes well and perfectly square. Magnets on the doors really grip well. Lots of shelves to hold a lot of items.
customer_reviews.author: Eric rse

customer_reviews.title: Great small storage but it stinks.
customer_reviews.text: Great little cabinet if your not looking for a ton of storage. But the smell is awful. It was made in China and they obviously use horrible chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: MissM

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for cheap price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Sturdy pieces. The only thin pieces are the back but you don’t see that anyway. The shelves are sturdy, too. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy to Assemble!!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised...but the other reviewers are correct! It took about 30 minutes. Pretty stable. But, it is light weight. Great for small space. The back is basically just a cardboard. Instructions are straight forward and easy to follow. Narrow and tidy!
customer_reviews.author: Siddhartha

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: I did give this a 5 star. BUT it doesn't last DONT BUY IT! I'll include pictures of what happened to one door. It's useless now!
customer_reviews.author: alysha

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: My husband started putting this together and then found that part E that connects the two back panels was not included. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Hyden

customer_reviews.title: Will never buy another product from this company. Idk how it got so many good reviews
customer_reviews.text: This looks nice however it is not very sturdy. Over priced for what you get. If you just touch it with one finger the whole thing wobbles
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: Love my new cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Just moved in to a new house with plenty of cabinet space, however, none that are facing the toilet. Thought something like this would be nice to having sitting near toilet for toilet paper and feminine products.. and it is perfect.. just what I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Monty

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking Cabinet just not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet is nice and it looks great in my bathroom. However, it is very wobbly and I am afraid that eventually it may fall over but as long as I am careful walking around it , it won’t fall.
customer_reviews.author: Sheridan Cockrel

customer_reviews.title: beautiful cabinet
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet is well constructed. thoughtful design. The packaging was very impressive. all the parts were intact and accounted for. good instructions and was able to put together quickly. very pleased with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: impossible  to assemble properly
customer_reviews.text: This is just as difficult to assemble as the smaller unit I purchased with this one. Neither one has parts that fit together properly. Not at all sturdy. And now I cant return it because it is past the one month period.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied (and surprised!) with how sturdy this is and was impressed by how easy the instructions were to follow. Didn’t take me long to put it together at all. It is as pictured. Couldn’t be happier with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for that extra storage in a small space.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect cabinet for small space in bathroom. Provides storage for those toiletry items that may get lost in an under-sink cabinet. Easy to assemble. Clever door installation.
customer_reviews.author: L. Scott

customer_reviews.title: nice cabinet
customer_reviews.text: small enough to fit in the game room bathroom. Looks very nice. Ample storage. The only negative is the strong chemical smell which lasted only a few weeks. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Carol M

customer_reviews.title: Works well even in smaller spaces.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble and it looks like a million bucks! Thinner than one might expect, great for making the most of small places, but don’t plan on putting your entire linen collection inside.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Great storage for many uses.
customer_reviews.text: Great storage for my bathroom! I needed some more cabinet space for various items and this is the perfect size and for my bathroom. It was easy to install by myself and only took less than a hour to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Broke right away! Poor quality materials.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality material and design. Door split apart at the hinge. Made of cheap fiberboard. Not worth half the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Smith

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this purchase. It looks great, especially considering the price. It fits perfectly into our powder room.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to move my makeup and hair tools from my bathroom to my bedroom. It’s only about 9 inches deep once assembled, so I’ll be on the hunt for organizing bins small enough to fit. Easy to assemble and packaged well enough I don’t think there is a risk for it coming damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Meg G

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my daughter. She loved it and so do i. Beautifully made and sturdy. Son-in-law put it together with no problem he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Noemia Topete

customer_reviews.title: Smooth assembly
customer_reviews.text: It is a DIY but all parts were there, they fit together, and the instructions (no text-- all visual) were fairly easy to follow. I do wish there was more adjustability with the shelves (there were a select number of possible shelf heights).
customer_reviews.author: Ruth R.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Great for additional bathroom storage and super easy to assemble. Not the highest quality materials, but what was expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and functional
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, looks great! I'd prefer it to be slightly deeper so it could fit towels or other linens better, but it's perfect for health and beauty aides and backups of tissues, toilet paper, etc.
customer_reviews.author: angela rossi

customer_reviews.title: Cabinets will work well.  Shelves are smaller than we expected.  Easy directions and good design.
customer_reviews.text: We are using these for storage for a side-area of our kitchen. They look neat and the construction is good. They will work for the over-flow items that usually clog our kitchen counter. We are pleased. The design is well planned and assembly makes sense. All parts were included and packaging was very protective.
customer_reviews.author: vick

customer_reviews.title: Shoe storage. Easy assemble
customer_reviews.text: I got this to store my shoes and it's perfect because it's not too big or too small. Very easy assemble, even me who didn't assemble much in her life ;)
customer_reviews.author: kristina

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet is exactly what I was looking for. It was the perfect size for my space, easy to put together, and well priced. I had no assembly issues and it was packaged very well. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Nice home essential
customer_reviews.text: Four stars because of the price point; there’s no reason this shelf should cost more than $45 to $50. Effortless assembly (I put it together in fewer than 30 minutes one morning before work) and nice, easy to clean surfaces. My main structural quirk is that the doors are slightly uneven. I would’ve preferred the inclusion of simple hinges to the dowel rods.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great.
customer_reviews.text: This fits perfectly where we needed it. I was able to place some storage bins inside to help organize. Super easy to assemble and is pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: L.L.

product_meta.title: VASAGLE Bathroom Floor Storage Cabinet with Double Door Adjustable Shelf, 23.6 x 11.8 x 31.5 Inches White UBCB60W
product_meta.description:
Color:White

VASAGLE wooden bathroom floor storage cabinet with 2 adjustable shelves is a great solution to keep your bathroom neat and beautifully displayed.

It comes with elegant white and high-quality material to match your home decor. With good quality paint, there is no awful smell. 2 interior adjustable shelves with 3 heights to choose are designed to store items of different sizes and keep your stuff away from dust and moisture.

Enjoy the clean and organized bathroom with the convenient and stylish smart storage cabinet.

Specification:
- Color: White 
- Material: P2 MDF 
- Assembly Needed: Yes 
- Overall Size: 23. 6"L x 11. 8"W x 31. 5"H(60 x 30 x 80 cm) 
- Product Weight: 27. 3 lbs (12. 4 kg)

Package Contents: 
- 1 x Bathroom Floor Cabinet 
- 1 x Bag of Accessories 
- 1 x Instruction

VASAGLE Notes: 
- During assembly, keep packaging materials away from children and pets.
feature_bullets: CONSIDERATE DESIGN: 2 interior shelves with 3 adjustable heights meet various storage needs; the closed storage room with 2 doors keeps your stuff away from dust; 2 chromed metal knobs make it convenient for daily use
WATERPROOF & EASY SETUP: High-quality material withstands the humidity of the bathroom and prevents moisture; all accessories and detailed instruction are included, setup is a breeeze
LARGE STORAGE CAPACITY: Sized 23. 6”L*11. 8”W*31. 5”H (60 x 30 x 80 cm), this bathroom cabinet provides extra space to hold your daily essentials and keep your bathroom neat and organized
100% SATISFACTION : VASAGLE provides a tailored customer service before and after your purchase, and we will always respond in less than 24 hours; don't wait any longer and enjoy it now!
SELECTED MATERIAL: Crafted from durable natural fiberboards for long-term use, paint to secure no harm to your family, a perfect choice for your bathroom
